phrs.translation: 高压手段, 长统靴, 长筒靴

sentences.sentence: When we came to power, a part of the country was under the LTTE jackboot.
sentences.translation: 当我们上台后，部分国家的猛虎组织掌。

sentences.sentence: It has a music and flats . It is a martial music. It has a jackboot rhythm.
sentences.translation: 它的乐曲不分升凋降调， 是一首军乐曲， 是长简靴的节奏。
